Articles.Content:
(If only I understood what that sentence meant)

(The user below me was a victim of Stuxnet)

Nope.

The user below me thinks he's a Chinese blueberry ninja.

In never occurred to me until you brought it up... o.O

The user below me isn't a big tasty bagel.

I wouldn't want to be one.

The user below me will get a blue screen of death, in real life.

Already done

The user below me will choose death over cake.

False. I'll have the chicken please. Remind me never again to fly Church of England.

The user below me is dreading the next few weeks for some reason.

*sigh* true...got another set of finals coming up!

The user below me is in a KSP builder company on this forum.

NOOOOOOPE. NOPEONPENOEPNOEPNOEPONE. Spacecraft companies are my pet peeve.

The user below me like classical music.

True. Particularly pieces such as "Ride of the Valkyries" and "Overture"

The user below me will have the penne arrabiata.

No.

The user below me has a blue name.

My name is ETHAN and I like blue but I don't know about my name?

The person below me loves YouTube.

Hmm... Tralse.

The user below me has the Goron Mask.

Nope.

The person below me made it to Laythe and back.

Not yet. I've built an Eve return vehicle able to get back to orbit from sea level, but for some reason the Joolian system scares me. Mostly because I fear I'll be stranded without fuel. I'll probably send a lot of missions there once resource mining hits in 1.0 and I can get fuel in situ.

The person below me regularly watches e-sports matches.

Nope

the person below me is British

(in Genie persona) EEEEHHHHH!!!! WRONG!

The person below me is American
Nope the person below me is from this univers

I certainly hope so!

The next poster has a pet cat or dog

Do guppies qualify as one of those?

The user below me once met a bear.

Yes I live near a lot of bears

the person below me has played ksp

Yep.

The person below me uses metric in a not yet metricified country.

Nope. I use metric, but so does the whole country.

The person below me has claustrophobia.

Nope.

The person below me has astrophobia.

It's more of a respect than fear. Anyway, I haven't had the opportunity to test that thoroughly, so I'm gonna go with "insufficient data, needs more research".

The person below me doesn't quite understand, but likes quantum physics.

It's more of a respect than fear. Anyway, I haven't had the opportunity to test that thoroughly, so I'm gonna go with "insufficient data, needs more research".

The person below me doesn't quite understand, but likes quantum physics.

False. I understand quantum physics. Although you could argue that no one understands quantum physics . . .

The person below me has never flown in an airplane.
